cumulated.pretty: ⊢ ((c0 ≠ ∅ ∧ c1 ∈(*Met ` c0)∧ c2 ∈(Fil ` c0))→(c2 ∈(CauFilU `(metUnif ` c1))↔ c2 ∈(CauFil ` c1)))

comment: Given a metric ` D ` and a uniform structure generated by that metric, Cauchy filter bases on that uniform structure are exactly the Cauchy filters for the metric. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Dec-2017.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Feb-2018.)
